## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description  | Type                                                 | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `variant` | `variant` | Card variant | `"default" \| "elevated" \| "outlined" \| undefined` | `undefined` |

| Slot       | Description             |
| ---------- | ----------------------- |
|            | Card content            |
